Cool, happy that it was reproducible. I'm away from my machine right now,
so I can't check this myself, but I think I might have been able to get it
to stop leaking by having `data` cpu-only, `Variable`-ing the batch, then
converting that Variable to `cuda`. Currently, the conversion to `Variable`
happens after `data` is in cuda form. I'm not sure if that worked or not,
to be clear, but I think it might've, if that helps.

I will check this when I get back, but it won't be for a few hours, so
anyone obviously take a look first if they are itching to.
